Label:
## Stay the case 

 All parties will be notified.

## Dismiss the case
This case will be dismissed. Parties will be able to view the case details but not take any actions on it.
What do you need to do?

A notification will be sent to all parties, asking them for an update on the case. 

 After 7 days, a new task will be created to progress the case.

By lifting the stay, this case will automatically be sent to a judge. 

 This will also raise a work allocation task for a judge to make a standard directions order for this case.

By lifting the stay, this case will return to 'Case progression' state. 

 A caseworker may need to schedule the next hearing for this case.

You are requesting an update on this case, the stay will not be lifted. 

 A notification will be sent to all parties, asking for an update on the case. 

 After 7 days, a new task will be created to progress the case.
